app.name: Custom elf for CBHC
app.long_description:
This will allow you to launch any Homebrew app that is not in the CBHC boot list.
Instructions: Place any Homebrew .elf file in the /wiiu/apps/custom/ folder and rename it to custom.elf
Either boot to it by pressing DOWN on the DPAD, select it from main CBHC menu or set it to AutoBoot..
